name: Don't Waver
description:
Take control of a frenzied oppossum and escape from the massive floods that are overtaking the world! Survive through set-backs, obstacles and hostile critters as you run for your life.

Water levels are rising everywhere! Humanity has already evacuated, but no one warned the wildlife of what is happening to the Earth.

Everyone in the animal kingdom now has to make do with what little humans left behind, and is running from the tidal wave threatening to submerge everything.

Dive in a kooky world full of fun details, and survive through set-backs, obstacles and hostile critters as you run for your life!

Features:
  • A mix of runner and survival gameplays
  • Collect resources and craft equipement on the go
  • Manage your HP and stamina with single-use items
  • Panicked beavers are trying to fix their dam and you are collateral damage

Don't Waver is the result of a five-and-a-half-days game jam we at Itchy conducted in the summer of 2021-- our very first one! We are a tiny indie dev team located in France currently working on projects like World of Furries and Spacefight.

Thank you for your interest! Enjoy your run!

Controls:
  • Move : Z, Q, S, D
  • Run : Shift
  • Jump : Space
  • Attack : E
  • Ranged attack : A
  • Loot : F
  • Validate (inventory) : Espace
  • Inventory : Tab
  • Dump (from menu) : Espace
  • Scroll usable items : 8
  • Scroll craftables : 6
  • Quick use item : 2
  • Quick use craft : 4
